price: Ajo tha: “Si mund të kem unë djalë, kur asnjë mashkull nuk më ka prekur e nuk jam as e pacipë?!”
arabic: قَالَتۡ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِي غُلَٰمٞ وَلَمۡ يَمۡسَسۡنِي بَشَرٞ وَلَمۡ أَكُ بَغِيّٗا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: qālat annā yakūnu lī ghulāmun walam yamsasnī basharun walam aku baghiyyan
